33/*
34 * Top users/processes display for Unix
35 */
36
37/* prototypes for functions found in utils.c */
38
39#ifndef _UTILS_H
40#define _UTILS_H
41
42int atoiwi(char *);
43char *itoa(int);
44char *itoa_w(int, int);
45char *itoa7(int);
46int digits(int);
47char *printable(char *);
48char *strcpyend(char *, const char *);
49char *homogenize(const char *);
50int string_index(const char *, const char **);
51char **argparse(char *, int *);
52long percentages(int, int *, long *, long *, long *);
53const char *errmsg(int);
54char *format_percent(double);
55char *format_time(long);
56char *format_k(long);
57char *string_list(const char **);
58void time_get(struct timeval *);
59void time_mark(struct timeval *);
60void double2tv(struct timeval *, double);
61unsigned int time_elapsed(void);
62unsigned int diff_per_second(unsigned int, unsigned int);
63void debug_set(int);
64#ifdef DEBUG
65#define dprintf xdprintf
66void xdprintf(char *fmt, ...);
67#else
68#ifdef HAVE_C99_VARIADIC_MACROS
69#define dprintf(...)
70#else
71#ifdef HAVE_GNU_VARIADIC_MACROS
72#define dprintf(x...)
73#else
74#define dprintf if (0)
75#endif
76#endif
77#endif
78
79#endif
